headline.print_headline: Court Restores Ashraf as Pakistan Chairman
headline.main: Court Restores Ashraf as Pakistan Chairman

docs.snippet: The Islamabad High Court (IHC) has once again restored Zaka Ashraf as chairman of the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB)....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Islamabad High Court (IHC) has once again restored Zaka Ashraf as chairman of the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB).

headline.print_headline: Atletico's Costa Limps Out of La Liga Game at Barca
headline.main: Atletico's Costa Limps Out of La Liga Game at Barca

docs.snippet: Atletico Madrid suffered a double blow that may affect their chances in next weekend's Champions League final when top scorer Diego Costa and playmaker Arda Turan limped out of Saturday's La Liga showdown at Barcelona....
docs.lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid suffered a double blow that may affect their chances in next weekend's Champions League final when top scorer Diego Costa and playmaker Arda Turan limped out of Saturday's La Liga showdown at Barcelona.

headline.print_headline: Atletico Madrid Win La Liga Title After Draw at Barca
headline.main: Atletico Madrid Win La Liga Title After Draw at Barca

docs.snippet: Atletico Madrid ended the decade-long dominance of Spanish giants Barcelona and Real Madrid by clinching a first La Liga title for 18 years in a thrilling climax to the campaign on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid ended the decade-long dominance of Spanish giants Barcelona and Real Madrid by clinching a first La Liga title for 18 years in a thrilling climax to the campaign on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic to Meet Nadal in Rome Final, Serena Through
headline.main: Djokovic to Meet Nadal in Rome Final, Serena Through

docs.snippet: The Italian Open will get its dream men's final on Sunday after Rafa Nadal's routine cuffing of Grigor Dimitrov set up an enticing match with Novak Djokovic that could be a barometer for the French Open....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Italian Open will get its dream men's final on Sunday after Rafa Nadal's routine cuffing of Grigor Dimitrov set up an enticing match with Novak Djokovic that could be a barometer for the French Open.

headline.print_headline: Nigeria Ready to Refer Boko Haram to Security Council: Source
headline.main: Nigeria Ready to Refer Boko Haram to Security Council: Source

docs.snippet: Nigeria is likely to refer the Islamist militant group Boko Haram to the United Nations Security Council for sanctions, a Western diplomatic source said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nigeria is likely to refer the Islamist militant group Boko Haram to the United Nations Security Council for sanctions, a Western diplomatic source said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Q&A: Baruchel Says He Lucked Out With 'Dragon'
headline.main: Q&A: Baruchel Says He Lucked Out With 'Dragon'

docs.snippet: Cannes is awash in glamorous celebrities who peacock on the festival's red carpet and confidently parade through its multitudes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cannes is awash in glamorous celebrities who peacock on the festival's red carpet and confidently parade through its multitudes.

headline.print_headline: AT&T Nears DirecTV Purchase in New Jolt to TV Landscape
headline.main: AT&T Nears DirecTV Purchase in New Jolt to TV Landscape

docs.snippet: AT&T T.N is close to announcing that it will buy the No. 1 U.S. satellite TV operator DirecTV DTV.O, according to people familiar with the matter, in the second potentially transformative deal to jolt the U.S. television industry this year....
docs.lead_paragraph: AT&T T.N is close to announcing that it will buy the No. 1 U.S. satellite TV operator DirecTV DTV.O, according to people familiar with the matter, in the second potentially transformative deal to jolt the U.S. television industry this year.

headline.sub: "It's wet, cold, there's no electricity, no running water" - Serbian flood victim
headline.main: "It's wet, cold, there's no electricity, no running water" - Serbian flood victim

docs.snippet: Thousands are evacuated from the Serbian town of Obrenovac, as flood victims grapple with what has been left behind in the worst floods in more than a century. Deborah Lutterbeck reports...
docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands are evacuated from the Serbian town of Obrenovac, as flood victims grapple with what has been left behind in the worst floods in more than a century. Deborah Lutterbeck reports

headline.print_headline: LeRoy Neiman Baseball Art Sells for $491,748
headline.main: LeRoy Neiman Baseball Art Sells for $491,748

docs.snippet: A collection of original baseball art created by celebrated sports artist LeRoy Neiman has sold for nearly $500,000 at auction....
docs.lead_paragraph: A collection of original baseball art created by celebrated sports artist LeRoy Neiman has sold for nearly $500,000 at auction.
